text: Hulu‘s new TV and movie releases for December 2-8 2024 include the complete first season of Paris Has Fallen. December 6, Friday will bring Paris Has Fallen Season 1 to the streamer. This series is set in the Has Fallen film universe that began with the Gerard Butler movie Olympus Has Fallen. Also coming out this week is The Convert. The Convert is an action-drama following a former soldier and lay preacher who comes to New Zealand to minister to the original British colonists. However, he is converted to serve another religion by the nation’s powerful chief. html:
Hulu‘s new TV and movie releases for December 2-8 2024 include the complete first season of Paris Has Fallen.

December 6, Friday will bring Paris Has Fallen Season 1 to the streamer. This series is set in the Has Fallen film universe that began with the Gerard Butler movie Olympus Has Fallen.

Also coming out this week is The Convert.

The Convert is an action-drama following a former soldier and lay preacher who comes to New Zealand to minister to the original British colonists. However, he is converted to serve another religion by the nation’s powerful chief.

New Hulu releases for December 2-8 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Hulu from December 2-8 2024.

December 3

  • Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern: Complete Season 1
  • Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern: Complete Season 2
